fs.polyglot.event
Class PolyglotTableModelAdapter

java.lang.Object
  fs.polyglot.event.PolyglotTableModelAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
PolyglotTableModelListener, java.util.EventListener
public class PolyglotTableModelAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements PolyglotTableModelListener

This is a convenience class for creating PolyglotTableModelListeners. All methods of this interface are implemented as empty stubs.

Author:
Simon Hampe

PolyglotTableModelAdapter()
           
 
Method Summary
 void languageListChanged(PolyglotTableModel source)
          This method is called, when any changes were committed to the language list
 void stringTableChanged(PolyglotTableModel source)
          This method is called when any heavy structural changes were committed to the actual string table that cannot be reflected by one of the other methods
 void tableDescriptionChanged(PolyglotTableModel source)
          This method is called when the table description has been changed
 void tableIDChanged(PolyglotTableModel source)
          This method is called, when the table id has been changed.
